Not anything like the hype made it out to be. 

The gore is insubstantial and sparse. There is some disturbing scenes involving paedophilia but the whole thing is almost submerged in self-mockery.

I read between the lines, this film laughs at you for watching it. It mocks you as it mocks itself for even bothering to indulge in the filth it is.

The soundtrack, however, is good, don't waste your download for that though.

Check out some of the new wave French cinema for proper horror/gore flicks.
